item.title: WWE 'Payback 2016' Rumors & Predictions: Projecting The Card For First Post-'WrestleMania' Big Event [PHOTOS, VIDEO]
item.description: With 'WrestleMania 32' said and done, it's time for some Superstars to seek revenge. Here is our projected card for WWE 'Payback," which emanates from the Allstate Arena in Illinois on May 1.
item.media:title: Roman Reigns
item.media:text:
With the dust settling on WrestleMania 32, some Superstars are on top of the mountain, while others will be seeking some vengeance.
The next big pay-per-view event and WWE Network special is Payback, and it emanates live from the Allstate Arena in Rosemont, Ill. on May 1. In the wake of a memorable WrestleMania, there will be a lot of scores to be settled once Payback rolls around.
Here is our projected card for the event.

item.title: WWE 'RAW' Spoilers & Rumors: Roman Reigns Era Begins With 'WrestleMania 32' Fallout [PHOTOS, POLL & VIDEO]

item.media:title: Roman Reigns
item.media:text: New WWE World Heavyweight Champion Roman Reigns.
